ygData.subject: Heritrix windows batch file

Hi folks,

Hopefully not too many firewalls or other interception systems will stop 
this e-mail. The windows launch batch file I am using is below, cut and 
paste into heritrix.bat and that should get the thing up and going. It is 
set for the D drive, pathing and drive letters can be changed. I extracted 
to the root of the D drive. if you have to use something like c:\program 
files\hertitrix, you have to enclose the entire path in quotes. Which is why 
I extracted to D:\directory\directory rather than "c:\program 
files\heritrix" (please note quotes).

cheer/s/r/Dan

----------------------begin batch file----------------------------------

set HERITRIX_HOME=d:\heritrix
set 
CLASSPATH=d:\heritrix\heritrix-1.6.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\ant-1.6.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\colt-subset-1.2.0.kb.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-cli-1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-codec-1.3.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-collections-3.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-httpclient-3.0-rc3.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-logging-1.0.4.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-pool-1.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\concurrent-1.3.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\dnsjava-1.6.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\dsi-unimi-it-1.0.0.kb.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\itext-1.2.0.jar;d:\heretrix\lib\j5compat-0.1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jasper-compiler-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jasper-runtime-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\javaswf-CVS-SNAPSHOT-1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\je-2.0.90.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jetty-4.2.23.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jmxri-1.2.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jmxtools-1.2.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\junit-3.8.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\libidn-0.5.9.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\MirrorJNDI-
1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\poi-2.0-RC1-20031102.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\poi-scratchpad-2.0-RC1-20031102.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\servlet-tomcat-4.1.30.jar
java -Xmx256m org.archive.crawler.Heritrix

-------------------------------------end batch 
file------------------------------------


r/d



Sometimes MSN E-mail will indicate that the mesasge failed to be delivered. 
Please resend when you get those, it does not mean that the mail box is bad, 
merely that MSN mail is over worked at the time.
